sentences.en: Some are pricey—a three-week intensive program can cost $4,500 or more—but most offer scholarships.
sentences.cn: 有些课程价格不菲——一个为期三周的强化课程可能要花费4500美元，甚至更多——但其中大多数都提供奖学金。

sentences.en: The town capitulated after a three-week siege.
sentences.cn: 这座城镇被围困三个星期后投降了。

sentences.en: Our girls have a three-week vacation a year.
sentences.cn: 我们的女职工每年有三个星期的休假。
